title: @Riot: Please disable ranked until servers resolve
body:
Hello again Riot,

I keep seeing people complain about losing LP because they got leaver status while servers are having known issues. Might i suggest disabling ranked until issues are resolved to avoid this problem? Thanks.

-K

PS- this was deleted from gameplay for being posted in the wrong section.  Why not instruct people to move posts instead of randomly deleting them and give people a message that lets them know where the proper place to have put them is.  TY

replies.body: I expect that if there's a hiccup on the server end ranked queue's will come to a sudden end, heck, I'm even completely happy if they tear down the games in progress under the remake paradigm.

They did the exact same thing to me when I asked why ranked wasn't disabled when the issue is clearly affecting many people and not everyone goes to the boards when they see the yellow exclamation mark because they don't think its a major issue and those people are going to be butt hurt over losing LP. I mean I'd disable it just to save them the headache that's going to come from all the people losing 
LP and being pissed.
Naw I say leave it up.  Let the kids play ranked and lose lp.  If they think they are too good for this to affect them, than they deserve a loss of lp.

People get into ranked games because the little yellow exclamation mark say's "We're aware of a problem causing players to disconnect from their games, and are investigating the problem."  not hey a shit ton of people can't connect to the game and if you're one of them you're going to take an automatic loss and a leave and all the glory that come with it. Based on my own experience (only two games) and the state of the boards its a large issue and perhaps Riot should do something about it.

Thanks for bringing this to our attention! As soon as we realized there was an issue with our servers causing players to be unable to stay connected in their games, we disabled Ranked Play until the problem was addressed. Rest easy knowing that we're working through to help any players that had lasting effects because of this issue.

About your post being deleted from gameplay, when our moderators remove a post you should be notified in your inbox as to why your post was deleted.
